title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define N 105#define M 1005#define db doublenamespace G{    struct edge{        int to; db flow; int next;    }side[M*2];    int head[N], ccnt = 1;    void insert(int from, int to, db flow)    {        side[++ccnt] = {to, flow, head[from]}; head[from] = ccnt;        side[++ccnt] = {from, 0, head[to]}; head[to] = ccnt;    }    void clear()    {        memset(side, 0, sizeof(side));        memset(head, 0, sizeof(head));        ccnt = 1;    }    int S, T;    int dis[N], cur[N];    db dinic();    bool bfs(int S, int T);    db dfs(int x, db flow);}using namespace G;int n, m, p;int u[M], v[M], w[M]; int maxflow;void solve1();void solve2();signed main(){    cin >> n >> m >> p;    for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++)        cin >> u[i] >> v[i] >> w[i];        solve1();}void solve1(){    for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++)        insert(u[i], v[i], w[i]);    }void solve2(){}db G::dinic();bool G::bfs(int S, int T);db G::dfs(int x, db flow);
